alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 2:22PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Simpson, south central Smith, Covington, western Jones and northeastern Jefferson Davis Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 222 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Collins, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Collins around 230 PM CDT. Seminary around 235 PM CDT. Hebron around 245 PM CDT. Ellisville and Moselle around 300 PM CDT. Laurel around 305 PM CDT. Tuckers Crossing around 315 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central, central and southeastern Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Covington; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Simpson; Smith
